thread.title: Defense Secretary James Mattis: ‘I Don’t Have Any Issues with the Press’
thread.title_full: Defense Secretary James Mattis: ‘I Don’t Have Any Issues with the Press’ | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: Defense Secretary James Mattis: ‘I Don’t Have Any Issues with the Press’
text:
Defense Sec. James Mattis on Pres. Trump calling the press the "enemy of the American people": "I don't have any issues with the press." pic.twitter.com/SRfmJp0QaI
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 19, 2017
Not very many Trump administration officials have yet addressed the president’s remarks about the press being the “enemy,” but Defense Secretary James Mattis did receive a question about it today.
Fox News national security correspondent Jennifer Griffin asked Mattis if he agrees with President Trump ‘s sentiments.
Mattis said, “I’ve had some rather contentious times with the press, but no, the press, as far as I’m concerned, are a constituency that we deal with, and I don’t have any issues with the press myself.”
Watch above, via ABC.
[ image via screengrab ]
